entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
